data.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
data.author: Winston Churchill, British Prime Minister

data.quote: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
data.author: Zig Ziglar, American motivational speaker

data.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
data.author: Theodore Roosevelt, American President

data.quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
data.author: Albert Einstein, Theoretical Physicist

data.quote: Just don't give up trying to do what you really want to do. Where there is love and inspiration, I don't think you can go wrong.
data.author: Ella Fitzgerald, American Jazz singer
